title: Battle For Moscow
synopsis: The story of a group of soldiers in the Red Army's Rifle Division and their fight to stop the Nazi advancement toward Moscow in 1941. Foreign language with subtitles.
shortSynopsis: The story of a group of soldiers in the Red Army's Rifle Division and their fight to stop the Nazi advancement toward Moscow in 1941. With subtitles.
mediumSynopsis: The story of a group of soldiers in the Red Army's Rifle Division and their fight to stop the Nazi advancement toward Moscow in 1941. Foreign language with subtitles.

title: Underworld: Blood Wars
synopsis: Kate Beckinsale's all-action 'death dealer' Selene is back to fight for the vampire cause once again as the lycans rise for the fifth time in the immortal fantasy series. But this time she's the target as the werewolves' new leader Marius (Tobias Menzies) has discovered that her blood holds the key to unlimited power. After making peace with the covens through her allies Thomas (Charles Dance) and David (Theo James), Selene prepares the vampire forces for their greatest battle yet against the lycan hordes.
shortSynopsis: Kate Beckinsale is back in black as the Death Dealer taking on the vampires and Lycans who want her - and each other - dead. Action horror sequel.
mediumSynopsis: Kate Beckinsale's all-action 'death dealer' Selene is back to fight for the vampire cause once again as the lycans rise for the fifth time in the immortal fantasy series. But this time she's the target as the werewolves' new leader Marius (Tobias Menzies) has discovered that her blood holds the key to unlimited power. After making peace with the covens through her allies Thomas (Charles Dance) and David (Theo James), Selene prepares the vampire forces for their greatest battle yet against the lycan hordes.

title: Xxx: Return Of Xander Cage
synopsis: Pumped-up athlete-turned- government operative Xander Cage (Vin Diesel) comes back from the dead to take on deadly alpha male warrior Xiang (Donnie Yen) and his team in a race to recover a sinister and seemingly unstoppable weapon known as Pandora's Box. Recruiting an all-new group of thrill-seeking cohorts, Xander finds himself enmeshed in a deadly conspiracy that points to collusion at the highest levels of world governments.
shortSynopsis: Vin Diesel is back as beefed-up superspy Xander Cage, brought out of exile to retrieve a powerful weapon known as Pandora's Box. Action sequel.
mediumSynopsis: Pumped-up athlete-turned- government operative Xander Cage (Vin Diesel) comes back from the dead to take on deadly alpha male warrior Xiang (Donnie Yen) and his team in a race to recover a sinister and seemingly unstoppable weapon known as Pandora's Box. Recruiting an all-new group of thrill-seeking cohorts, Xander finds himself enmeshed in a deadly conspiracy that points to collusion at the highest levels of world governments.

title: Assassin's Creed
synopsis: The hugely popular video game franchise transitions to the silver screen as Michael Fassbender stars as Callum Lynch, a career criminal saved from death row by pioneering scientist Sophia Rikkin (Marion Cotillard) and her powerful father Alan (Jeremy Irons). By tapping into Callum's past and reliving the experiences of his ancient assassin ancestor the Rikkins hope to locate the Apple of Eden, an ancient artefact of untold power. It could be used to end violence and conflict once and for all, but is that really what they and secret order the Knights Templar want it for? Stylish action adventure from Macbeth director Justin Kurzel.
shortSynopsis: Stylish action with Michael Fassbender as a career criminal saved from death row by a shadowy organisation. But for what purpose?
mediumSynopsis: The hugely popular video game franchise transitions to the silver screen as Michael Fassbender stars as Callum Lynch, a career criminal saved from death row by pioneering scientist Sophia Rikkin (Marion Cotillard) and her powerful father Alan (Jeremy Irons). By tapping into Callum's past and reliving the experiences of his ancient assassin ancestor the Rikkins hope to locate the Apple of Eden, an ancient artefact of untold power. It could be used to end violence and conflict once and for all, but is that really what they and secret order the Knights Templar want it for? Stylish action adventure from Macbeth director Justin Kurzel.

title: The Shadow Effect
synopsis: A doctor tries to help a young man whose life is turned upside down when his violent dreams begin to blend with reality. Thriller with Jonathan Rhys Meyers and Cam Gigandet.
shortSynopsis: A doctor tries to help a young man whose life is turned upside down when his violent dreams begin to blend with reality. Thriller with Jonathan Rhys Meyers and Cam Gigandet.
mediumSynopsis: A doctor tries to help a young man whose life is turned upside down when his violent dreams begin to blend with reality. Thriller with Jonathan Rhys Meyers and Cam Gigandet.

title: Why Him?
synopsis: Bryan Cranston stars as Ned Fleming, the proud owner of a mom-and-pop printing company hit with a curveball just before Christmas. Daddy's little girl Stephanie (Zoey Deutch) has found herself a boyfriend, and she wants the whole family - including mum Barb (Megan Mullally) and impressionable teenage brother Scotty (Griffin Gluck) - to come and meet him over the holidays. What could possibly go wrong? Plenty is the answer, as her beau is none other than Laird Mayhew (James Franco) - a foul-mouthed and frequently shirtless internet millionaire with some pretty serious boundary issues. Raucous festive comedy from I Love You, Man director John Hamburg.
shortSynopsis: Raucous comedy starring Bryan Cranston as a protective dad whose daughter begins dating foul-mouthed playboy millionaire James Franco.
mediumSynopsis: Bryan Cranston stars as Ned Fleming, the proud owner of a mom-and-pop printing company hit with a curveball just before Christmas. Daddy's little girl Stephanie (Zoey Deutch) has found herself a boyfriend, and she wants the whole family - including mum Barb (Megan Mullally) and impressionable teenage brother Scotty (Griffin Gluck) - to come and meet him over the holidays. What could possibly go wrong? Plenty is the answer, as her beau is none other than Laird Mayhew (James Franco) - a foul-mouthed and frequently shirtless internet millionaire with some pretty serious boundary issues. Raucous festive comedy from I Love You, Man director John Hamburg.

title: Toni Erdmann
synopsis: Divorced piano teacher Winfried (Peter Simonischek) aimlessly fritters his suburban retirement away with practical jokes, taking especial delight in disguising himself as his grotesque alter ego Toni Erdmann - Germany's answer to Sir Les Patterson. When Winfried's dog dies, he heads off to see his thirty-something daughter Ines (the brilliant Sandra Huller), a fraught exec trying to climb the company ladder in Bucharest. The trouble is, Toni has a habit of turning up and cramping her corporate style. Touching, offbeat and peppered with scenes of laugh-out-loud brilliance, writer-director Maren Ade concocts a sublimely awkward celebration of the father-daughter bond.
shortSynopsis: Oscar-nominated black comedy about a workaholic thirtysomething visited by her practical joker dad. With subtitles.
mediumSynopsis: Oscar-nominated black comedy about a workaholic thirtysomething visited by her practical joker dad. With subtitles.

title: Journey To The West: The Demons Strike Back
synopsis: A naive Buddhist monk and his quick-tempered monkey sidekick battle demons and perform exorcisms across the land. Fantasy adventure with subtitles.
shortSynopsis: A naive Buddhist monk and his quick-tempered monkey sidekick battle demons and perform exorcisms across the land. Fantasy adventure with subtitles.
mediumSynopsis: A naive Buddhist monk and his quick-tempered monkey sidekick battle demons and perform exorcisms across the land. Fantasy adventure with subtitles.

title: N.O.L.A. Circus - The Soul Of New Orleans
synopsis: Raucous comedy centred around two neighbouring New Orleans barber shops. On one side black hairdresser Will (Martin Bats Bradford) preaches against racial prejudice while having a secret affair with aspiring actress Nola (Jessica Morali). On the other, sex addict Marvin (Vas Blackwood) is  having a passionate affair with Karen (Kamille McCuin), a small time pot dealer. Tensions rise when Nola's protective brother shows up... as well as a trio of  Ku Klux Klan members.
shortSynopsis: Hairdressing, sex, jealousy and even the Ku Klux Klan fuel tensions among the misfit residents of a New Orleans neighbourhood. Eccentric comedy.
mediumSynopsis: Hairdressing, sex, jealousy and even the Ku Klux Klan fuel tensions among the misfit residents of a New Orleans neighbourhood. Eccentric comedy.

title: Girl Asleep
synopsis: Just days before she turns 15, awkward Australian teen Greta (Bethany Whitmore) finds herself in a new school in a new suburb.  She's befriended by the dorky Elliott (Harrison Feldman) but there's trouble at home when he eccentric mother (Amber McMahon) insists she host the whole school at her birthday party.
shortSynopsis: Surreal, 70s-set coming-of-age tale about a shy teen flung into a parallel world when her parents throw her a surprise birthday party.
mediumSynopsis: Just days before she turns 15, awkward Australian teen Greta (Bethany Whitmore) finds herself in a new school in a new suburb.  She's befriended by the dorky Elliott (Harrison Feldman) but there's trouble at home when he eccentric mother (Amber McMahon) insists she host the whole school at her birthday party.

title: Gold (2016)
synopsis: Matthew McConaughey stars as Kenny Wells, a badly struggling mining man who necks half a gallon of whiskey before passing out and dreaming of striking it rich in Indonesia. With nothing to lose he gathers his last dollars and dimes, hops on a plane and hooks up with renegade geologist Michael Acosta (Edgar Ramirez). Together they go digging for gold and - against all odds - hit pay dirt, but with rivals and slippery Wall Street types circling like sharks, keeping hold of the haul won't be easy. Fact-based drama from Syriana director Stephen Gaghan, with support from Bryce Dallas Howard, Corey Stoll and Toby Kebbell.
shortSynopsis: Fact-based drama starring Matthew McConaughey as a down-on-his-luck mining man who has a vision of striking it rich in Indonesia.
mediumSynopsis: Matthew McConaughey stars as Kenny Wells, a badly struggling mining man who necks half a gallon of whiskey before passing out and dreaming of striking it rich in Indonesia. With nothing to lose he gathers his last dollars and dimes, hops on a plane and hooks up with renegade geologist Michael Acosta (Edgar Ramirez). Together they go digging for gold and - against all odds - hit pay dirt, but with rivals and slippery Wall Street types circling like sharks, keeping hold of the haul won't be easy. Fact-based drama from Syriana director Stephen Gaghan, with support from Bryce Dallas Howard, Corey Stoll and Toby Kebbell.

title: T2 Trainspotting
synopsis: It's been 20 years since heroin addict Mark Renton (Ewan McGregor) ripped off his lowlife friends and fled to Amsterdam with all the proceeds from a drug deal. Now clean, he returns to Edinburgh to make amends but finds that little has changed. Sick Boy (Jonny Lee Miller) is living dangerously as a blackmailer. Spud (Ewen Bremner) is the hapless, unemployable junkie he always was. And Frank Begbie (Robert Carlisle) is still a raging psychopath to be avoided at all costs. Unfortunately, he's just broken out of prison and is not about to let auld acquaintance be forgot. Director Danny Boyle and screenwriter John Hodge tap the same bleakly, blackly comic vein as their 1996 cult classic for a fast and furiously nihilistic nostalgia rush.
shortSynopsis: Two decades on from the gang's big deal in London, Renton returns to Edinburgh to make amends. Top sequel starring Ewan McGregor and Jonny Lee Miller.
mediumSynopsis: It's been 20 years since heroin addict Mark Renton (Ewan McGregor) ripped off his lowlife friends and fled to Amsterdam with all the proceeds from a drug deal. Now clean, he returns to Edinburgh to make amends but finds that little has changed. Sick Boy (Jonny Lee Miller) is living dangerously as a blackmailer. Spud (Ewen Bremner) is the hapless, unemployable junkie he always was. And Frank Begbie (Robert Carlisle) is still a raging psychopath to be avoided at all costs. Unfortunately, he's just broken out of prison and is not about to let auld acquaintance be forgot. Director Danny Boyle and screenwriter John Hodge tap the same bleakly, blackly comic vein as their 1996 cult classic for a fast and furiously nihilistic nostalgia rush.

title: Loving
synopsis: After getting married in Washington DC, unassuming working man Richard Loving (Joel Edgerton), who's white, and his bride Mildred (Oscar nominee Ruth Negga), who's black, return to their home state of Virginia to be with their families. But with interracial marriage outlawed in the state, the couple find themselves jailed and then banished from everything they hold dear. But after years in exile, they decide to take their case to the Supreme Court. Two admirably understated performances and direction to match from Jeff Nichols (Mud, Midnight Special) make this a splendidly clear-eyed account of a civil rights case that changed American history.
shortSynopsis: Oscar-nominated drama starring Ruth Negga and Joel Edgerton as a real-life interracial couple targeted by the authorities in 1950s Virginia.
mediumSynopsis: After getting married in Washington DC, unassuming working man Richard Loving (Joel Edgerton), who's white, and his bride Mildred (Oscar nominee Ruth Negga), who's black, return to their home state of Virginia to be with their families. But with interracial marriage outlawed in the state, the couple find themselves jailed and then banished from everything they hold dear. But after years in exile, they decide to take their case to the Supreme Court. Two admirably understated performances and direction to match from Jeff Nichols (Mud, Midnight Special) make this a splendidly clear-eyed account of a civil rights case that changed American history.

title: Jackie
synopsis: A never-better Natalie Portman plays the widowed Jacqueline Kennedy - America's favourite first lady - in the stunned aftermath of her husband JFK's assassination. Emotionally adrift and sidelined by an establishment machine that immediately clicks into gear, Jackie must reassert herself, comfort her children and forge a new path under the gaze of millions. Diamond-hard yet emotionally raw, this masterly biopic - Chilean director Pablo Larrain's first English-language feature - breaks practically all the rules,
shortSynopsis: Powerful drama charting the aftermath of John F Kennedy's assassination and its impact on wife Jackie. Starring an Oscar-nominated Natalie Portman.
mediumSynopsis: A never-better Natalie Portman plays the widowed Jacqueline Kennedy - America's favourite first lady - in the stunned aftermath of her husband JFK's assassination. Emotionally adrift and sidelined by an establishment machine that immediately clicks into gear, Jackie must reassert herself, comfort her children and forge a new path under the gaze of millions. Diamond-hard yet emotionally raw, this masterly biopic - Chilean director Pablo Larrain's first English-language feature - breaks practically all the rules,

title: Manchester By The Sea
synopsis: Casey Affleck gives a career-best performance as Lee Chandler, a quiet, closed-off janitor living a life of almost complete isolation in Quincy, Massachusetts. Beyond outbursts of drunk, self-destructive violence he barely interacts with the world around him, but when older brother Joe (Kyle Chandler) collapses and dies he's forced to return to his home town - the titular Manchester-by-the-Sea. He's astonished to learn that teenage nephew Patrick (Lucas Hedges) has been left in his care, and as he wrestles with this new responsibility the ghosts of his past threaten to pull him under for good. Deeply moving drama from writer-director Kenneth Lonergan, with stunning support from Michelle Williams.
shortSynopsis: Oscar-winning drama starring Casey Affleck as a troubled, emotionally withdrawn janitor who returns to his hometown after his brother's death.
mediumSynopsis: Casey Affleck gives a career-best performance as Lee Chandler, a quiet, closed-off janitor living a life of almost complete isolation in Quincy, Massachusetts. Beyond outbursts of drunk, self-destructive violence he barely interacts with the world around him, but when older brother Joe (Kyle Chandler) collapses and dies he's forced to return to his home town - the titular Manchester-by-the-Sea. He's astonished to learn that teenage nephew Patrick (Lucas Hedges) has been left in his care, and as he wrestles with this new responsibility the ghosts of his past threaten to pull him under for good. Deeply moving drama from writer-director Kenneth Lonergan, with stunning support from Michelle Williams.

title: The Lego Batman Movie
synopsis: Everything is super-awesome as the Lego version of DC Comics' greatest hero (in his opinion) swings into action to save Gotham City from The Joker (voiced by Zack Galifianakis) and his latest army of mega-villains. Again. This time, however, Batman (Will Arnett) finds his one-man, two-ego operation compromised by a feisty new police commissioner (Rosario Dawson) and some orphan kid who's desperate to become his sidekick (Michael Cera). But what the heck kind of superhero name is Robin? Maintaining the Lego movie standards of energy, anarchy, wit and imagination - whilst poking fun at every sci-fi and fantasy franchise between Mordor and the Matrix - this is another wonderfully constructive exercise. Buy & Keep before 18.06.17 for your chance to win a family trip to LEGOLAND. Full terms and conditions apply (https://www.skystore.com/n/lbtc/terms-and-conditions).
shortSynopsis: The Lego Movie gets a super-awesome spin-off as the Caped Crusader (voiced by Will Arnett) swings into action to save Gotham City from The Joker. Buy & Keep before 18.06.17 for your chance to win a family trip to LEGOLAND. Full terms and conditions apply.
mediumSynopsis: The Lego Movie gets a super-awesome spin-off as the Caped Crusader (voiced by Will Arnett) swings into action to save Gotham City from The Joker. Buy & Keep before 18.06.17 for your chance to win a family trip to LEGOLAND. Full terms and conditions apply.

title: Sing
synopsis: It's Zootropolis meets The X-Factor as cuddly theatre impresario Buster Moon (voiced by Matthew McConaughey) tries to revive his dwindling business with a big-money singing competition. With stars (and dollar signs) in their eyes, the aspiring talents are soon queuing round the block, including a porky housewife (Reese Witherspoon), a teenage rock-upine (Scarlett Johansson), a gorilla getaway driver (Taron Egerton), and a mouse with a Sinatra complex (Seth MacFarlane). Unfortunately, they may change their tune when they find that the prize isn't quite as advertised. Put your pop-loving paws in the air for another big-hearted crowd-pleaser from the studio behind the Minions.
shortSynopsis: Fun family animation about a theatre-owning koala who sets up a singing competition in a last-ditch bid to stay afloat.
mediumSynopsis: It's Zootropolis meets The X-Factor as cuddly theatre impresario Buster Moon (voiced by Matthew McConaughey) tries to revive his dwindling business with a big-money singing competition. With stars (and dollar signs) in their eyes, the aspiring talents are soon queuing round the block, including a porky housewife (Reese Witherspoon), a teenage rock-upine (Scarlett Johansson), a gorilla getaway driver (Taron Egerton), and a mouse with a Sinatra complex (Seth MacFarlane). Unfortunately, they may change their tune when they find that the prize isn't quite as advertised. Put your pop-loving paws in the air for another big-hearted crowd-pleaser from the studio behind the Minions.

title: Ballerina
synopsis: Set in 1879 Paris. An orphan girl (voiced by Elle Fanning) dreams of becoming a ballerina and flees her rural Brittany for Paris, where she passes for someone else and lands the position of pupil at the Grand Opera house.
shortSynopsis: Animated adventure about a feisty young dreamer who leaves her orphanage and blags her way into a top Paris ballet school.
mediumSynopsis: Set in 1879 Paris. An orphan girl (voiced by Elle Fanning) dreams of becoming a ballerina and flees her rural Brittany for Paris, where she passes for someone else and lands the position of pupil at the Grand Opera house.

title: Fantastic Beasts And Where To Find Them
synopsis: Hogwarts old boy Newt Scamander (Eddie Redmayne) heads to Prohibition-era New York with a bottomless suitcase full of banned magical beasts. However, unaware of the rising tension between the secret world of US wizards and a fanatical faction of No-Majs (American for Muggles) bent on eradicating them, he finds himself in the middle of a war. It doesn't help that his caseful of creatures keeps escaping into the city. This historical chapter in Harry Potter's wizarding world compellingly explores a new dimension in an adventure that's pure magic.
shortSynopsis: Harry Potter spin-off starring Eddie Redmayne as a wizarding Brit who arrives in 1920s New York with a bagful of magical beasts.
mediumSynopsis: Hogwarts old boy Newt Scamander (Eddie Redmayne) heads to Prohibition-era New York with a bottomless suitcase full of banned magical beasts. However, unaware of the rising tension between the secret world of US wizards and a fanatical faction of No-Majs (American for Muggles) bent on eradicating them, he finds himself in the middle of a war. It doesn't help that his caseful of creatures keeps escaping into the city. This historical chapter in Harry Potter's wizarding world compellingly explores a new dimension in an adventure that's pure magic.

title: Max 2: White House Hero
synopsis: Military dog Max befriends the president's son and helps uncover a dangerous plot when a new assignment brings him to Washington, DC. Family drama.
shortSynopsis: Military dog Max befriends the president's son and helps uncover a dangerous plot when a new assignment brings him to Washington, DC. Family drama.
mediumSynopsis: Military dog Max befriends the president's son and helps uncover a dangerous plot when a new assignment brings him to Washington, DC. Family drama.

title: Rings (2017)
synopsis: The curse of the ring continues in this third film in the horror franchise. Girlfriend Julia (Matilda Lutz) is worried about the obsession her inquisitive boyfriend Holt (Alex Roe) has for the dark urban legend that features a mysterious videoptape that kills seven days after viewing. When she triggers the terrible cycle, she's visited by a series of terrifying ordeals - from burning phones to mysterious scars on her body - as the days ebb away. Nail-biting horror sequel.
shortSynopsis: The curse continues when college kid Alex Roe and girlfriend Matilda Lutz both watch the death-bringing videotape. Unsettling horror sequel.
mediumSynopsis: The curse of the ring continues in this third film in the horror franchise. Girlfriend Julia (Matilda Lutz) is worried about the obsession her inquisitive boyfriend Holt (Alex Roe) has for the dark urban legend that features a mysterious videoptape that kills seven days after viewing. When she triggers the terrible cycle, she's visited by a series of terrifying ordeals - from burning phones to mysterious scars on her body - as the days ebb away. Nail-biting horror sequel.

title: Land Of The Dead
synopsis: Twenty-years after zombie-meister George Romero last brought the undead to life on the big screen they're back - besieging a fortified city. Street warrior Riley (Simon Baker) has to square up to ruthless opportunist leader Kaufman (Dennis Hopper) while in the shadows the shuffling zombies are breaching the defences. Scary and often pretty grim, this doesn't quite pack the punch the original themes did two decades ago.
shortSynopsis: Under siege by the undead, cigar-chomping commander Dennis Hopper marshals the human survivors in a fortress. Apocalyptic zombie horror.
mediumSynopsis: Twenty-years after zombie-meister George Romero last brought the undead to life on the big screen they're back - besieging a fortified city. Street warrior Riley (Simon Baker) has to square up to ruthless opportunist leader Kaufman (Dennis Hopper) while in the shadows the shuffling zombies are breaching the defences. Scary and often pretty grim, this doesn't quite pack the punch the original themes did two decades ago.

title: Contamination
synopsis: Former astronaut Commander Ian Hubbard (Ian McCulloch) teams up with a government agent and a police detective to track the source of mysterious alien pod spores, filled with lethal flesh-dissolving acid. They are traced back  to a South American coffee plantation controlled by alien pod clones.
shortSynopsis: A former astronaut teams up with a government agent and a cop to find the source of deadly alien eggs. Sci-fi horror. Ian McCulloch stars.
mediumSynopsis: Former astronaut Commander Ian Hubbard (Ian McCulloch) teams up with a government agent and a police detective to track the source of mysterious alien pod spores, filled with lethal flesh-dissolving acid. They are traced back  to a South American coffee plantation controlled by alien pod clones.

title: Let Her Out
synopsis: A young woman recovering from an accident finds herself plagued by traumatic visions, hallucinations and blackouts. Unsettling horror starring Alanna LeVierge.
shortSynopsis: A young woman recovering from an accident finds herself plagued by traumatic visions, hallucinations and blackouts. Unsettling horror.
mediumSynopsis: A young woman recovering from an accident finds herself plagued by traumatic visions, hallucinations and blackouts. Unsettling horror starring Alanna LeVierge.

title: House Of Evil
synopsis: A young couple's dream move to a large, remote country house quickly descends into a nightmare as they begin to realise they are not alone.
shortSynopsis: A young couple's dream move to a large, remote country house quickly descends into a nightmare as they begin to realise they are not alone.
mediumSynopsis: A young couple's dream move to a large, remote country house quickly descends into a nightmare as they begin to realise they are not alone.

title: Something To Talk About
synopsis: Julia Roberts plays stable-manager Grace Bichon, who discovers her husband Dennis Quaid is having an affair. Emboldened by her stern challenge to his unfaithfulness, she begins to question the authority of everyone around her, including her own father (Robert Duvall). A sharp script from Thelma & Louise's Callie Khourie ensures things don't get too sentimental.
shortSynopsis: Smart rom-com starring Julia Roberts as a stable-manager who discovers that husband Dennis Quaid is having an affair.
mediumSynopsis: Julia Roberts plays stable-manager Grace Bichon, who discovers her husband Dennis Quaid is having an affair. Emboldened by her stern challenge to his unfaithfulness, she begins to question the authority of everyone around her, including her own father (Robert Duvall). A sharp script from Thelma & Louise's Callie Khourie ensures things don't get too sentimental.

title: Theo And Hugo
synopsis: Two men meet at a sex club and forge a connection, but reality soon confronts them in an unexpected way. French drama with subtitles.
shortSynopsis: Two men meet at a sex club and forge a connection, but reality soon confronts them in an unexpected way. French drama.
mediumSynopsis: Two men meet at a sex club and forge a connection, but reality soon confronts them in an unexpected way. French drama with subtitles.

title: Up For Love
synopsis: Renowned lawyer and divorcee Diane (Virginia Efira) loses her mobile phone... and then receives a call from Alexandre (The Artist's Best Actor Oscar-winner Jean Dujardin), the man who found it. He's obviously the perfect gentleman, but when they meet Diane is surprised to discover that her shining knight is only 4ft 6ins tall. Fighting society prejudice and their own fears, the mismatched couple strive to make a go of their relationship. A charming French comedy designed to change perspectives.
shortSynopsis: A vertically-challenged architect woos a beautiful lawyer over the phone, but will his stature prove a stumbling block? French rom-com.
mediumSynopsis: Renowned lawyer and divorcee Diane (Virginia Efira) loses her mobile phone... and then receives a call from Alexandre (The Artist's Best Actor Oscar-winner Jean Dujardin), the man who found it. He's obviously the perfect gentleman, but when they meet Diane is surprised to discover that her shining knight is only 4ft 6ins tall. Fighting society prejudice and their own fears, the mismatched couple strive to make a go of their relationship. A charming French comedy designed to change perspectives.

title: Burning Blue
synopsis: Two fatal aircraft accidents aboard an American aircraft carrier prompt an investigation with a government agent placed aboard the ship. However, his mission takes on a different colour hue when a sailor reports seeing one of the top ranking fighter pilots in a gay club. The aviator and three of his squadron mates and their spouses all become the subject of a deadly modern day witch hunt entangling them in a web of jealousy and deceit. Based on the 1922 play.
shortSynopsis: An investigation into a series of fatal accidents involving US Navy fighter pilots turns into a homophobic witch hunt.
mediumSynopsis: An investigation into a series of fatal accidents involving US Navy fighter pilots turns into a homophobic witch hunt. Military drama with Trent Ford and Rob Mayes.

title: Beautiful Something
synopsis: Wealthy Los Angeles talent agent Bob (John Lescault) cruises the streets in his white limousine looking for male talent - the "beautiful something" of the title. Crossing his path are struggling poet Brian (Brian Sheppard), career-focussed sculptor Drew (Colman Domingo) and his neglected young lover Jim (Zack Ryan). In between bouts of loveless sex, the men engage in anguished confessionals.
shortSynopsis: Four gay men, including a wealthy talent agent and a poet struggling for inspiration, look for love on a cold Philadelphia night. Drama starring Colman Domingo.
mediumSynopsis: Four gay men, including a wealthy talent agent and a poet struggling for inspiration, look for love on a cold Philadelphia night. Drama starring Colman Domingo.

title: Rogue One: A Star Wars Story
synopsis: It's time for another jaunt to everyone's favourite galaxy far, far away as Godzilla director Gareth Edwards serves up the first of three stand-alone Star Wars adventures. Events pick up directly before A New Hope, with the beleaguered Rebel Alliance desperately scrambling to stop the completion of the Empire's new super-weapon - the Death Star. To prevent untold destruction, fugitive Jyn Erso (Felicity Jones) - the daughter of Death Star designer Galen Erso (Mads Mikkelsen) - must team up with an unlikely band of heroes and steal crucial plans. With Diego Luna, Ben Mendelsohn and The Night Of star Riz Ahmed.
shortSynopsis: A ragtag group of rebels embark on a daring, against-all-odds mission to thwart the planet-destroying plans of the Empire. Star Wars prequel.
mediumSynopsis: It's time for another jaunt to everyone's favourite galaxy far, far away as Godzilla director Gareth Edwards serves up the first of three stand-alone Star Wars adventures. Events pick up directly before A New Hope, with the beleaguered Rebel Alliance desperately scrambling to stop the completion of the Empire's new super-weapon - the Death Star. To prevent untold destruction, fugitive Jyn Erso (Felicity Jones) - the daughter of Death Star designer Galen Erso (Mads Mikkelsen) - must team up with an unlikely band of heroes and steal crucial plans. With Diego Luna, Ben Mendelsohn and The Night Of star Riz Ahmed.

title: Passengers (2016)
synopsis: In this sci-fi romance, engineer Jim Preston (Chris Pratt) finds himself erroneously awoken early from his hibernation pod on the corporate starship Avalon as it ploughs through space with 5,000 settlers on board in suspended animation. He realises that the journey has ninety years left so - after months alone - makes the decision to wake up fellow passenger  Aurora Lane (Jennifer Lawrence). They fall for each other...but she is unaware of Jim's morally questionable actions.
shortSynopsis: Stylish sci-fi romance starring Chris Pratt and Jennifer Lawrence as space travellers awoken from cryosleep far too soon. With Michael Sheen.
mediumSynopsis: In this sci-fi romance, engineer Jim Preston (Chris Pratt) finds himself erroneously awoken early from his hibernation pod on the corporate starship Avalon as it ploughs through space with 5,000 settlers on board in suspended animation. He realises that the journey has ninety years left so - after months alone - makes the decision to wake up fellow passenger  Aurora Lane (Jennifer Lawrence). They fall for each other...but she is unaware of Jim's morally questionable actions.

title: Battle For The Planet Of The Apes
synopsis: A race of intelligent chimps vies with warlike gorillas and deadly mutant humans for control of a post-apocalyptic Earth. The fifth and final instalment in the sci-fi adventure series, starring Roddy McDowall, Claude Akins and Paul Williams, and featuring a cameo appearance by John Huston.
shortSynopsis: Sci-fi adventure, with Roddy McDowall.
mediumSynopsis: Final film in the series. A small band of warrior humans triggers ape civil war. Look out for legendary director John Huston at the start.

title: Battlestar Galactica: The Plan
synopsis: See the attack on the Twelve Colonies from the perspective of the Cylons in this feature-length companion piece to the brilliant sci-fi series.
shortSynopsis: See the attack on the Twelve Colonies from the perspective of the Cylons in this feature-length companion piece to the brilliant sci-fi series.
mediumSynopsis: See the attack on the Twelve Colonies from the perspective of the Cylons in this feature-length companion piece to the brilliant sci-fi series.

title: The Winter Soldier
synopsis: In a future where the earth is frozen over and virtually uninhabitable, an elite team of soldiers are sent to hunt down the leader of a humanoid rebellion. Sci-fi thriller.
shortSynopsis: In a future where the earth is frozen over and virtually uninhabitable, a team of soldiers are sent to hunt down the leader of a humanoid rebellion.
mediumSynopsis: In a future where the earth is frozen over and virtually uninhabitable, an elite team of soldiers are sent to hunt down the leader of a humanoid rebellion. Sci-fi thriller.

title: Split
synopsis: M Night Shyamalan is back in business with this creepy psychological horror. It begins with the abduction of three teenage girls - BFFs Claire (Haley Lu Richardson) and Marcia (Jessica Sula), plus loner Casey (The Witch's Anya Taylor-Joy). They wake up in the underground lair of one Kevin Crumb (James McAvoy), a man whose struggles with dissociative identity disorder are about to take a profoundly unsettling turn. Despite the best efforts of his psychiatrist (Betty Buckley), the most unstable of Kevin's 23 personalities are now firmly running the show. And what they've got planned isn't for the faint-hearted. Something wicked this way comes...
shortSynopsis: Three teenage girls are abducted by a man struggling with dissociative identity disorder. Creepy psychological horror starring James McAvoy.

Despite the best efforts of his psychiatrist (Betty Buckley), the most unstable of Kevin's 23 personalities are now firmly running the show. And what they've got planned isn't for the faint-hearted. Something wicked this way comes...

title: Detour
synopsis: Los Angeles law student Harper (Tye Sheridan) blames his despised stepfather Vincent (Stephen Moyer) for the death of his mother in a car crash. While drowning his sorrows in a bar he vents his spleen to moody wrong 'un Johnny Ray (Emory Cohen)... and sets in train a barking plan to assassinate Vincent in Vegas. Serpentine thriller from British director Christopher Smith.

title: Burn Country
synopsis: After being kicked out of his own country, aspiring Afghan journalist Osman (Dominic Rains) finds an equally unfriendly welcome in Northern California. While taking a job on a local newspaper, he finds himself in the firing line while attempting to uncover local corruption.
shortSynopsis: Mystery drama about an Afghan journalist who moves to small-town California and begins investigating the disappearance of a local.
mediumSynopsis: Mystery drama about an Afghan journalist who moves to small-town California and begins investigating the disappearance of a local.

title: Bonded By Blood 2: The New...
synopsis: The violent aftermath of the notorious 'Range Rover' drug murders sees a new generation of flashier Essex Boys filling the criminal power vacuum. Meet drugs kingpin Ricky (Josh Myers), wired psycho Damon (George Russo) and wannabe hoodlum Dean ( Sam Strike) as they set out to make their bloody mark.
shortSynopsis: In the aftermath of the infamous Range Rover killings, a group of younger, flashier criminals emerge to fill the power vacuum. Crime thriller.
mediumSynopsis: The violent aftermath of the notorious 'Range Rover' drug murders sees a new generation of flashier Essex Boys filling the criminal power vacuum. title: Man Down
synopsis: Hard-hitting drama starring Shia LaBeouf as a battle-scarred US Marine tormented by his time in Afghanistan. With Jai Courtney, Gary Oldman and Kate Mara.
shortSynopsis: Hard-hitting drama starring Shia LaBeouf as a battle-scarred US Marine tormented by his time in Afghanistan. With Jai Courtney and Gary Oldman.
